snippet: The billionaire Warren E. Buffett told CNBC that his $32 billion acquisition of Precision Castparts, the biggest of his career, would not leave him short of cash for other investments.
abstract: Warren E Buffett says that his company Berkshire Hathaway still has cash to invest after his $32 billion acquisition of Precision Castparts, biggest of his career.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire Warren E. Buffett told CNBC that his $32 billion acquisition of Precision Castparts, the biggest of his career, would not leave him short of cash for other investments.

headline.main: Berkshire Hathaway Still Has Cash to Invest, Buffett Says
headline.print_headline: Berkshire Hathaway Still Has Cash to Invest, Buffett Says
